channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Drone/The Apprentice
channel.description:
## Class: The Drone
Class: The Drone Type: Neutral Offensive Unique: N Conversions: The Apprentice/The Invoker
Passive 1: No Thought The Psychic is unable to link minds with The Drone.
Passive 2: Focused Immune to occupation.
Day Ability 1: Mimic (three uses) Attempt to unknowingly use the targets day ability. The target will not lose a use of the ability. (The target will not know that someone mimicked them) (Can Mimic ANY ability besides King's decide fate)
Night Ability 1: Mind Trick (infinite uses) All who visit the target player will instead visit another target player. Players will not know that they visited the wrong player. You will not know if players visited your target.
Objective: Protect 3 players from death and live to tell the tale.
Lore: After a round where only The Prince and The Invoker remained. The Blue Dragon won, but they had to do something with The Invoker. So they sentenced him to 5 years in a mental hospital. The Invoker was cured of his loyalty to the cult, however he still had his abilities. After the 5 year sentence, The cured Invoker tried to join The Blue Dragon, but they feared he would turn on them, so they kicked him out. Then The Invoker became an outcast, and eventually The Drone.
## Class: The Apprentice Type: Unseen Support Unique: N Converts From: The Drone
Passive 1: Graduation When The Mastermind dies, The Apprentice will take their place.
Example: Lawrence Bardolf has become the new Mastermind.
Night Ability 1: Rummage (infinite uses) Attempt to Forage. There is a chance you will find Nightshade. If you find Nightshade The Assassin will gain an extra use of the ability.
Night Ability 2: Plan B (3 uses) Follow The Mastermind, if The Masterminds target cannot be converted, you will attack them. (If the target is attacked, The Apprentice will visit them).
Unseen chat: The Apprentice has decided to follow The Mastermind.
Mastermind chat: You were unable to convert your target, so The Apprentice attacked them!
Apprentice chat: The Mastermind was unable to convert their target, so you attacked them!
Objective: Kill all BD and NK's. (Like the other unseen)
Lore: One day when The outcast Drone was sneaking around the castle. The Mastermind saw potential in him, so he offered him a place in The Unseen. The Drone became filled with rage, he wanted to get revenge on The Blue Dragon for denying him. So he joined The Unseen, becoming The Masterminds apprentice.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Drone/The Apprentice
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Balec:

Passive 1: No Thought (infinite uses)

Passives don’t have uses; this si just an editing mistake, easy to fix.

Balec:

Day Ability 1: Mimic (three uses)
Attempt to unknowingly use the targets day ability.
The target will not lose a use of the ability.
(The target will not know that someone mimicked them)

I’m assuming you can’t use the king’s royal finger?

Balec:

Night Ability 1: Mind Trick (infinite uses)
All who visit the target player will instead visit another target player.

so you choose two players, and if anyone who attempts to visit the first will instead visit the second? Like a one-way transporter?

Balec:

Objective: Protect a player from death and live to tell the tale.

Are you assigned a target? why not use mid trick on them every night?

Balec:

Passive 1: Graduation (1 use)
When The Mastermind dies, The Apprentice will take their place.

once again, passives don’t have uses; please edit

Balec:

Night Ability 1: Rummage (infinite uses)
Attempt to Forage.
There is a 50% chance you will find Nightshade.
If you find Nightshade The Assassin will gain an extra use of the ability.

There shouldn’t be soemthing with a direct randomness in the game, other then players randomly choosing targets. Also, some people get really mad when ou suggest a role that gives the assassin night shade.

Balec:

Night Ability 2: Plan B (1 use)
Follow The Mastermind, if The Masterminds target cannot be converted, you will attack them.
(If the target is attacked, The Apprentice will visit them).

only 1 use?

Summary: Good idea, needs fixing around the edges.
